author: hotspringfinder
title: Flutter SDK
description: Flutter是发展最快的移动应用开发者社区，但目前在Cardano生态系统中还没有Flutter库的支持。

f6_assessments.q0: 顾名思义，提议者希望建立工具，使安卓和IOS设备上的卡达诺集成应用变得简单。其影响将是巨大的，因为需要更多的Dapps移动或不移动。Cardano的增长依赖于这样的项目，以邀请更多的经济激励在生态系统中。如果你是一个不懂技术的人。SDK（软件开发工具包）对于开发者编写应用程序是必要的。该提案绝对知道它要解决的问题是什么，以及解决这个问题时将会遇到的挑战。这个项目将为Cardano生态系统带来价值，提案明确指出它将如何做到这一点。遗憾的是，没有关键的指标来说明与挑战设置的一致性。考虑到团队会是什么样子，我不怀疑这个项目在未来能有规模。  与其他提案相比，我想说这个提案在使支持者能够跟上方面有点欠缺。
f6_assessments.q1: 提议者已经在以前的融资回合中证明了他的工作流程，并有一个正在运行和交付的项目可言。这是一个很大的保证，持续的工作、交付和质量将达到Cardano社区的标准。我有一个小建议，就是实际列出一些将在该项目上工作的人的资历，因为列出整体的经验总结是很好的，但它并没有给提案带来更多的可信度，因为没有证据证明这个说法。我个人会关注这个项目的进展。团队成员的链接是为任何提案带来可信度的宝贵资产。预算已经列出，虽然没有细分，但当你看每小时的图表时，你就会明白钱会花在哪里。作为一名开发人员，我相信这是一个现实的时间表来完成所述工作。建议书很好地描述了整个实施的方式，而不仅仅是原因，这从技术角度来说是很重要的。为实现该项目所需的所有资源都得到了很好的描述和理解。对于非技术人员来说，几乎有太多的技术解释。挑战和风险可能没有被考虑到，但考虑到提案人的经验，我认为这不是问题。
f6_assessments.q2: 有一个开放源码库，任何人都可以跟踪提案的进展，所以在可审计性方面很好，因为任何社区成员都可以轻松地检查正在进行的工作。我建议有一个更彻底的监测计划。可以从提案的关键绩效指标中提出更多要求，比如：添加率、SDK的下载量等等。有一个或多或少明确的路线图，但除了github之外，没有任何地方可以遵循它，这可能足够好（时间会证明）。有一个明确的问题需要解决，也有解决的方法。  对于未来的提案，我建议用更多的非技术性描述，对于任何感兴趣的人，你可以留下一个白皮书或某种技术设计文档的链接。

f6_assessments.q0: This software is providing a core SDK for Cardano and will benefit developers from the Google Flutter project environment. These SDKs will save substantial efforts in the future and will provide a rapid onboarding experience. This is the right project for this challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has already developed a functional and usable Flutter SDK that can be used for creating mobile and desktop wallets. The features that are proposed in this fund are imported and with the competence of the proposer and based on his work so far it is very likely that he will be able to complete the work.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a clear list of deliverables and each one of them is important. The code is hosted in open and can be reviewed. The success of the proposal and its impact depends on the adaptation of the SDK. This is an unknown area and can only be measured after the development and proliferation of the Cardano Smart Contract environment.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal looks to complete an open source Flutter SDK project that the community can use to interact with the Cardano blockchain in a mobile environment. To reach mass adoption the community will need to have SDKs in multiple languages and environments so that DApp builds are able to create solutions using the Cardano blockchain. Providing this proposal can be executed well it could have a large impact on opening the door to developers who prefer working with Flutter as a development environment. To give a better impact score it would have been great to see some people already using the SDK or some evidence of the demand for it so that to an advisor it is crystal clear that this proposal will start producing more impact within the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer adds in their background in the relevant experience section but does not attach a source such as a LinkedIn profile. A video is provided of the SDK and also a link to the open source repository. Both the repository and the video help to provide sufficient evidence that the proposer has the expertise to complete this proposal as has already been demonstrated in the code produced. The tasks and hours are broken down by feature into very reasonable time frames along with a very reasonable budget for completing those tasks. The following tasks for the proposal appear to be more complex by nature to provide all the functionality required however based on the information and evidence provided it appears likely this proposal can be executed as intended.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer adds a detailed feature roadmap with the hours required and the repository and video also give good clarity on what the proposal is intending to do. No success objectives or KPIs are provided. It would have been great to see some KPIs or evidence of types of projects that are interested in using this SDK as some extra information. The project is already open source so the existing and ongoing implementation can easily be audited.

f6_assessments.q0: Open source SDK's are critical to making Cardano development a fully decentralized process with low barriers to entry. This proposal is an extension to the fund 5 backed proposal to build and maintain a Flutter SDK for Cardano wallet.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer covers their progress made since fund5 in the initial section of the proposal and expands on their plan to develop a production ready Flutter SDK with full Cardano wallet functionality (contracts, staking, native assets).
f6_assessments.q2: The info provided in the fund 7 goals, SDK demo and pub dev link are sufficient to audit the progress and successful outcomes for this proposal.

solution: 完成5号基金的开源Flutter SDK，为Flutter的移动、网络和桌面开发者提供一个生产就绪的Cardano on-ramp。
experience:
5号基金项目筹资和交付
4年 Flutter/Dart
10年 iOS/Android
25年 服务器端Java
6年工具/代码生成
